sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"解释"或"说明"之意。
means: explanation ： 普通用词，指使人明白未知或不清楚的事。
definition ： 主要指对某一词、短语或专门术语的含义作解释、下定义。
description ： 指对某一事物的重要方面进行详细叙述，常含教育与启迪意味。
exposition ： 通常指对论点、假设、理论等的重点作详尽的阐述。
interpretation ： 多指对文字上较难的段落，或难于理解，令人迷惑的问题作出解释或说明。

word_mean: 解释，阐明：在精神疗法上，治疗医生用病人能理解的语言来解释病人所做的事，所说的话，所体验的事物的潜在或隐匿的含义
从影像中获取语义信息的基本过程。

sentence.Network_en: The opposition Conservative Party put a different interpretation on the figures.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对党保守党对这些数字提出一番不同的解释。

sentence.Network_en: Language interpretation is the whole point of the act of reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 阅读行为中关键在于对语言的理解。

sentence.Network_en: Their interpretation was faulty — they had misinterpreted things.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的理解是错误的——他们将事情曲解了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French interpretation or Latin interpretatio(n-), from the verb interpretari (see interpret)

entry.def: An interpretation of something is an opinion about what it means.

example.ex: The opposition Conservative Party put a different interpretation on the figures...
example.tran: 反对党保守党对这些数字提出一番不同的解释。

example.ex: Analysis and interpretation is a very personal thing.
example.tran: 分析与说明是个很主观的事情。

entry.def: A performer's interpretation of something such as a piece of music or a role in a play is the particular way in which they choose to perform it.

example.ex: ...her full-bodied interpretation of the role of Micaela.
example.tran: 她对米凯拉这个角色全身心的演绎

means.word_mean: 1. a mental representation of the meaning or significance of something
2. the act of interpreting something as expressed in an artistic performance;

sentences.sentence: "her rendition of Milton's verse was extraordinarily moving"

means.word_mean: 3. an explanation that results from interpreting something;

sentences.sentence: "the report included his interpretation of the forensic evidence"

means.word_mean: 4. an explanation of something that is not immediately obvious;

sentences.sentence: "the edict was subject to many interpretations"
"he annoyed us with his interpreting of parables"
"often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child's intended meaning"

auth_sentence.content: Well, just how beautiful is open to interpretation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well, just how beautiful is open to interpretation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well, just how beautiful is open to interpretation.

auth_sentence.content: No, I wouldn't make the same interpretation.
auth_sentence.res_content: No, I wouldn't make the same interpretation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No, I wouldn't make the same interpretation.

auth_sentence.content: This is just my personal interpretation of existing theories.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is just my personal interpretation of existing theories.

Sentence.sentence: Some scientistsmaintain that the changes we are seeing fall within the range of random (无规律的) variation—some years are cold, others warm, and we have just had an unremarkable string of warm yearsrecently—but that is becoming an increasingly rare interpretation in the face of continued and increasing warm conditions.
The Phoenix, in Mid-Levels, offers the widest interpretation of "British cuisine", while still trying to maintain its soul.
Their own interpretation of American politics.

means.word_mean: 解释, 说明; 诠释

sentences.en: This rule does not allow of more than one interpretation.
sentences.cn: 这条规则只能有一种解释。

sentences.en: This passage is open to a variety of interpretations.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章可以有各种不同的解释。

jushi.english: This rule does not allow of more than one interpretation.
jushi.chinese: 这条规则只能有一种解释。

jushi.english: This passage is open to a variety of interpretations.
jushi.chinese: 这篇文章可以有各种不同的解释。

jushi.english: A musician usually has his own interpretation of a piece of music.
jushi.chinese: 音乐家对一支乐曲通常有自己的艺术处理办法。
